phrs.translation: 惧内, 妻管炎, 古时称妻子为内人, 顺从妻子的
床头跪, 半世老婆奴, 怕老婆的丈夫
全英国最怕老婆的男人
惧内的, 顺从妻子的

sentences.sentence: Don't be henpecked. Show her you're the boss!
sentences.translation: 别这么“妻管炎”，让她知道你才是老大。

sentences.sentence: After getting married, he turns to be henpecked.
sentences.translation: 结婚后他完全变成了“气管炎”。

sentences.sentence: Amoeba or henpecked husband? Hey? E one and the same!
sentences.translation: 变形虫还是惧内的丈夫？本是同根生！
